songs.title: Future Primitive Culinary School
songs.lyrics:
[Hook: Kool A.D. x2]
Wow, wow, wow…
My rabble is too [?]
My scramble is too ample
Oceanic
My lifestyle is tight magic
Wow, wow…

[Verse 1: Kool A.D.]
Kool ridiculous
My culinary school future primitive
Superlyrical [?]
Chemical game super testicle
Lame stupid vestibule
[?] sucker-ass marks want to tug at my parts, nada
Art so, how shall I say?
Picasso
No, no, no, no, no he didn’t but I did though
Kool A.D., the kid go
The white nigga-ro
Figaro
Kick verses and ghost like what floats boat hearses
They be like “Kool A.D., you the worstest”
Nah, I’m the bestest so
Wouldn’t be the same without me, like Mexico
Don’t get it bro?
You’re an idiot
I’m an idiot
The more I smoke, yo
The smaller the philly get
My mouth move me
Like I’m a quadriplelilegic

[Sample: Selda Bağcan - "Meydan Sizindir"]

[Hook]

[Verse 2: Chippy Nonstop]
[?] scared when I go to work
On the internet, the hoes yeah they wanna lurk
Superpowers, yeah yeah, they gonna make you twerk

[Sample: Selda Bağcan - "Meydan Sizindir"]

[Hook]
